name: Only Jupyter
onCreateCommand: pwd; ls -la; echo '#!/bin/sh' > set_path.sh; echo 'echo $USERNAME $USER' >> set_path.sh; echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/python/current/bin:/usr/local/py-utils/bin:/usr/local/share/nvm/current/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/home/$USER/.local/bin:$PATH"' >> set_path.sh; chmod +x set_path.sh; ./set_path.sh;
